Town Departments
================

### Town Municipal Office

**Mailing Address:**  
3301 Carmen Avenue  
Rancho Viejo, Texas 78575

**Phone:** (956) 350-4093  
**Fax:** (956) 350-4156  
**Office Hours:** Monday to Friday 8:00 A.M. - 5:00 P.M.

[Visit Department Page](https://www.ranchoviejotexas.com/municipal-departments/office/ "Town Municipal Office")

### Police Department

**Mailing Address:**  
3301 Carmen Avenue  
Rancho Viejo, Texas 78575

**Emergency Phone:** (956) 350-9000 or 911  
**Non-Emergency Phone:** (956) 350-4093  
**Fax:** (956) 350-4156  
Police Protection 24 hours a day, 7 days a week

[Visit Department Page](https://www.ranchoviejotexas.com/municipal-departments/police-department/ "Police Department")

**Mailing Address**  
3301 Carmen Avenue  
Rancho Viejo, TX 78575

**Phone:** (956)350-4093

[Visit Department Page](https://www.ranchoviejotexas.com/municipal-departments/emergency-preparedness/ "Emergency Preparedness")

[Sign Up For Alerts](https://www.citizenobserver.com/registration.jsp)

Receive alerts from the Town Hall and local law enforcement about town meetings, crimes, emergencies and other important information.

All Alerts are delivered via e-mail and are also available via text message on your cell phone.
